description: This action allows users to retrieve a list of Engagement records from Partner Central. This action can be used to manage and track various engagements across different stages of the partner selling process.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request.

parameters.name: CreatedBy
parameters.description: A list of AWS account IDs. When specified, the response includes engagements created by these accounts. This filter is useful for finding engagements created by specific team members. (string) ---

parameters.name: EngagementIdentifier
parameters.description: An array of strings representing engagement identifiers to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: ExcludeCreatedBy
parameters.description: An array of strings representing AWS Account IDs. Use this to exclude engagements created by specific users. (string) ---

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting parameters for listing Engagements. The field by which to sort the results. The order in which to sort the results.

nested_params.name: SortBy
nested_params.description: The field by which to sort the results.

nested_params.name: SortOrder
nested_params.description: The order in which to sort the results.

nested_items.name: EngagementSummaryList
nested_items.description: An array of engagement summary objects.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created Engagement.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the Engagement was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The AWS Account ID of the Engagement creator.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the Engagement.

nested_items.name: MemberCount
nested_items.description: The number of members in the Engagement.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results. This field will be null if there are no more results.
